{{ section.title }}

import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-dashboard', templateUrl: './dashboard.component.html', styleUrls: ['./dashboard.component.css'] }) export class DashboardComponent { sections = [ { key: 'banner', title: 'Banni√®re' }, { key: 'event', title: '√âv√©nement' }, { key: 'ad', title: 'Publicit√©' }, { key: 'video', title: 'Vid√©o' }, { key: 'product', title: 'Produit' }, { key: 'testimonial', title: 'T√©moignage' }, { key: 'news', title: 'Actualit√©' } ]; expandedSection: string | null = null; visibleForms: { [key: string]: boolean } = {}; expandSection(section: string, event: Event) { event.stopPropagation(); this.expandedSection = this.expandedSection === section ? null : section; } isExpanded(section: string): boolean { return this.expandedSection === section; } toggleForm(section: string, event: Event) { event.stopPropagation(); this.visibleForms[section] = !this.visibleForms[section]; } isFormVisible(section: string): boolean { return this.visibleForms[section] || false; } }
